model.development

Class DevCardManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.development.DevCardManager

  • public class DevCardManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The DevCardManager handles all interactions with development cards.
    Version:
    1.0 Build Jan, 2016.
    Author:
    Christian Riboldi, Clayton Condie, Jacob Brewer, Joshua Powers, Joshua Van Steeter

      • drawCard

        public DevCardType drawCard(int playerIndex)
                     throws NotEnoughDevCardsException
        Draws a development card for the given player.
        Parameters:
        playerIndex - The index of the player drawing the card.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughDevCardsException - if there are no development cards left to draw.
